comment.author: 14170629@N08
comment._content:
This photo is from July 15, 1913, the 3rd race at Belmont, a 5 1/2 furlong claiming race for two-year-olds. The jockey is Thomas McTaggart (see photo of Roamer for full details).

Finishing second is Delft (b.f. 1911 Burgomaster x Blue Girl, by Sir Dixon), third place to Gallop (b.c. 1911 Martinet x Common Sue, by The Commoner).
